XPI Gate’s documentation¶

XPI Gate is a server service which is converting provided zip or xpi to xpi using chosen Add-on SDK.

Source files are send using POST message. System does not require to be logged in and is not providing any user accounts

Contents:

  • Jessy James Garret’s Doc System
    • Strategy
